name: Gamestonks (Gamestonks)
description:
Start with an almost empty bank account and trade yourself to a billionaire. But be careful each trading season is limited in time and every decision will influence directly the share price.

Don’t become too greedy! Take reasonable investment decisions and manage your risk. The stock market is unpredictable this days. Hedgefonds will try to steal your money, brokers won’t allow you to buy and sell new shares and Elon Musk won’t always be stock friendly either.

Find the right investment strategy and your bank account will go to the moon and your hands will be full of diamonds.

Give us your feedback and improvement ideas at: gamestonkshw@gmail.com

Things planned for future updates:

- Ranking table with the depots of every user
- Buy billionaire gadgets for your upcoming avatar
- Real-time Multiplayer pvp trading
